item.title: 德国在寻找买家之际再次延长俄罗斯石油公司托管期
item.description: 德国可能第四次延长对俄罗斯国家能源巨头俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）当地子公司的托管期，以便给莫斯科更多时间出售被查封的实体。【原文：Germany is likely to extend its trusteeship over the local subsidiaries of Russia’s state energy giant Rosneft PJSC for a fourth time in order to give Moscow more time for the sale of the seized entity.】

item.title: 瑞银分析师称梅尔罗斯的 "现金山 "并没有那么大
item.description: 据瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的分析师称，被梅尔罗斯工业公司（Melrose Industries Plc）称为 "现金山 "的喷气发动机业务的价值实际上只有这家英国航空航天工程师公司管理层估计的一半左右。【原文：A jet-engine business described by Melrose Industries Plc as a “cash mountain” is actually worth about half the estimate by the UK aerospace engineer’s management, according to analysts at UBS Group AG.】

item.title: 赞比亚拒绝将电价上调 156%，因为干旱加剧了电力削减
item.description: 赞比亚能源监管机构拒绝了国家电力公司提出的将电费提高 156% 以支付紧急供应费用的建议，理由是这将对通货膨胀和就业产生负面影响。【原文：Zambia’s energy regulator refused the state power utility’s proposal to increase electricity tariffs by as much as 156% to cover the cost of emergency supplies, citing the negative impact it would have on inflation and jobs.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚西方石油公司交易破裂波及整个拉丁美洲
item.description:
前部长称左派总统古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）否决了Ecopetrol SA公司价值36亿美元的协议。【原文：

Ex-minister says leftist President Gustavo Petro vetoed Ecopetrol SA’s $3.6 billion agreement.

】

item.title: 大型科技公司的主导地位正迫使指数超级大国重新思考规则
item.description: 大科技公司的蓬勃发展让华尔街无所不能的指数提供商头疼不已，他们只需大笔一挥，就能将数十亿美元的基准追踪资金转移到其他公司。【原文：The Big Tech boom is causing headaches for all-powerful index providers on Wall Street, who can send billions of benchmark-tracking dollars on the move with just a stroke of the pen.】

item.title: 迪诺成为波兰连锁超市价格战的牺牲品
item.description: 波兰超市之间的价格战自今年年初开始肆虐，损害了波兰增长最快的连锁超市的利润。【原文：A price war between Polish supermarkets that has been raging since early this year is hurting profits at the country’s fastest-growing chain.】

item.title: 火箭新卫队在经历坎坷后瞄准人工智能助力反弹
item.description: Rocket Cos.是美国最大的抵押贷款公司之一，过去的一年对于该公司来说是动荡的一年：公司报告了作为上市公司的首次年度亏损，经历了抵押贷款发放量的历史性下降，并更换了首席执行官。【原文：The past year has been a tumultuous one for Rocket Cos., one of the nation’s largest mortgage lenders: the firm reported its first annual loss as a public company, navigated a historic drop-off in mortgage originations and replaced its chief executive officer.】

item.title: 全球最大钴生产商预计供应压力将有所缓解
item.description: 全球最大的钴生产商中国五矿集团有限公司预计，今年下半年供应压力将开始缓解。【原文：China’s CMOC Group Ltd., the world’s biggest cobalt producer, expects supply pressures to start easing in the second half of this year.】

item.title: 美联储官员在杰克逊霍尔讲话的最新情况
item.description: 游客从怀俄明州莫兰的杰克逊湖小屋眺望大提顿国家公园山脉。摄影师：大卫-保罗-莫里斯/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Visitors view the Grand Teton National Park mountain range from the Jackson Lake Lodge in Moran, Wyoming. Photographer: David Paul Morris/Bloomberg】

item.title: 清洁能源蓬勃发展，中国顶级太阳能企业利润大幅增长
item.description: 中国市值最大的太阳能设备制造商 Sungrow Power Supply Co.【原文：Sungrow Power Supply Co., China’s largest solar equipment manufacturer by market capitalization, reported a surge in its profit in the first half of the year as the country’s stellar renewable power expansion continues to fuel demand.】

item.title: 股价暴跌后，巴宝莉在英国富时 100 指数中长达 15 年的排名接近尾声
item.description: 巴宝莉集团（Burberry Group Plc）即将退出富时 100 指数，结束这家奢侈品制造商在英国蓝筹股中长达 15 年的地位。【原文：Burberry Group Plc is on the verge of exiting the FTSE 100 Index, ending the luxury-goods maker’s 15-year stay in the UK blue-chip gauge.】

item.title: 雀巢在首席执行官的实验性赌注之后重新专注于食品销售
item.description: 这家全球最大的食品公司正在返璞归真，为不断增长的地球提供食物，但地球上的消费者更加精明，经济更加拮据。【原文：The world’s biggest food company is getting back to basics — feeding a growing planet, but one whose consumers are both more savvy and financially stretched.】

item.title: 新兴市场将结束本周涨势，交易员等待鲍威尔到来
item.description: 在投资者为美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔周五晚些时候在杰克逊霍尔会议上的讲话做准备之际，新兴市场股市连续第三周上涨，货币保持升势。【原文：Emerging-market stocks headed for a third week of gains and currencies held their advance as investors prepared for Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s speech at the Jackson Hole gathering later on Friday.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。今天是市场期待已久的一天，美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔将于今天上午晚些时候在杰克逊霍尔发表讲话。与此同时，日本央行表示仍将继续加息。在其他方面，雀巢公司首席执行官的变动也引发了质疑。【原文：Good morning. Today is the day the market’s been waiting for, with Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell due to speak at Jackson Hole later this morning. Meanwhile the Bank of Japan signaled it remains on a rate hiking path. And elsewhere, Nestle’s CEO change is raising questions.— Morwenna Coniam.】

item.title: 荷兰检察官调查交易商维托尔在哈萨克斯坦的活动
item.description: 大宗商品贸易巨头维托尔集团（Vitol Group）正因其在哈萨克斯坦的活动而受到荷兰公诉机关的调查，这是这家全球最大的独立石油贸易商最近遭遇的法律纠纷。【原文：Commodity trading giant Vitol Group is being investigated by the Dutch Public Prosecution Service for its activities in Kazakhstan, the latest legal worry for the world’s largest independent oil trader.】

item.title: 巫师》制作人的星际之旅面临游戏管道的挑战
item.description: CD Projekt SA 公司的下一代大片游戏《巫师》让该公司的股价一路飙升，但鉴于其中的风险，分析师对其涨势能否持续持怀疑态度。【原文：Optimism around CD Projekt SA’s next generation of blockbuster game The Witcher has sent the shares soaring, though given the risks involved analysts are skeptical the gains will last.】

item.title: 雀巢股价低迷为施耐德的任期蒙上阴影
item.description: 雀巢公司近年来疲软的股价表现给马克-施耐德担任这家消费品巨头首席执行官的日子蒙上了一层阴影。【原文：Nestle SA’s weak share-price performance in recent years has cast a shadow over Mark Schneider’s time as chief executive officer of the consumer-goods giant.】

item.title: 法国兴业银行退出 LME 交易大厅，给交易所带来打击
item.description: 法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）将退出伦敦金属交易所（London Metal Exchange）的公开喊价交易大厅，此举将使人们对标志性的 "环形 "作为全球金属市场关键的定价机制的可行性产生新的疑问。【原文：Societe Generale SA is withdrawing from the London Metal Exchange’s open-outcry trading floor, in a move that will raise fresh questions about the viability of the iconic “Ring” as a key price-setting mechanism in global metal markets.】

item.title: 克罗地亚以旅游租赁为目标解决住房紧张问题
item.description: 克罗地亚正在设法解决这个欧盟国家的住房短缺问题，办法是有效遏制旅游业中私人公寓的出租，使家庭更能负担得起居住空间。【原文：Croatia is seeking to tackle a housing shortage in the European Union nation by effectively curbing the rental of private apartments in the crucial tourism industry to make living space more affordable for families.】

item.title: 橡树计划为都柏林的 3,800 套住宅项目寻求合作伙伴
item.description: 据知情人士透露，橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management LP）的一家合资企业计划寻找一个股权合作伙伴，帮助开发都柏林的一个项目，该项目建成后预计价值数十亿欧元。【原文：An Oaktree Capital Management LP venture plans to seek an equity partner to help develop a Dublin project that’s expected to be valued at billions of euro when it’s completed, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 瑞士财长驳斥瑞银反对增加资本的游说
item.description: 瑞士财政部长卡琳-凯勒-萨特（Karin Keller-Sutter）明确表示，目前瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）反对新资本要求的游说活动不会动摇她的立场。【原文：Swiss Finance Minister Karin Keller-Sutter made clear that the current lobbying campaign by UBS Group AG against new capital requirements isn’t going to sway her.】

item.title: 阿达尼电力公司欠孟加拉国 8 亿美元会费未付
item.description: 亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的发电公司从孟加拉国拖欠了多达 8 亿美元的款项，孟加拉国数周的暴力抗议造成数百人死亡，并迫使上届政府于本月下台。【原文：Billionaire Gautam Adani’s power generating unit has raked up unpaid dues of as much as $800 million from Bangladesh, where weeks of violent protests left hundreds dead and forced out the previous administration this month.】

item.title: 杰克逊霍尔历史表明鲍威尔将回避市场冲击
item.description: 如果说财政部和美国股市对杰罗姆-鲍威尔周五在杰克逊霍尔（Jackson Hole）研讨会上的讲话抱有一丝希望，那就是："他将采取稳妥的策略：他将稳妥行事。【原文：If Treasury and US stock markets are betting on one thing from Jerome Powell at the Jackson Hole symposium Friday, it’s this: He’ll play it safe.】

item.title: 尽管动荡不安，欧元小国仍设法削减债务成本
item.description: 欧洲任职时间最长的主权债务管理负责人之一削减了借贷成本，尽管他的国家经历了前所未有的动荡，包括总理遇刺未遂、预算井喷和信用评级下调。【原文：One of Europe’s longest-serving sovereign debt management chiefs has cut borrowing costs even as his nation went through unprecedented upheaval, including an assassination attempt on the prime minister, a budget blowout and a credit-rating downgrade.】

item.title: 欧洲央行武契奇认为将逐步降息，但敦促谨慎行事
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员鲍里斯-武伊契奇（Boris Vujcic）表示，随着通胀率向 2% 靠拢，欧洲中央银行可能还有缓慢降息的空间，但风险依然存在，官员们必须谨慎行事。【原文：The European Central Bank probably has room to slowly lower interest rates as inflation converges toward 2%, but risks remain and officials must proceed carefully, according to Governing Council member Boris Vujcic.】

item.title: 据说CVC和DSV将为德铁信可提交140亿欧元的竞标价
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，丹麦运输集团 DSV A/S 和由 CVC Capital Partners Plc 牵头的财团分别提出了具有约束力的出价，对德国铁路公司物流部门的估值约为 140 亿欧元（156 亿美元）。【原文：Danish transport group DSV A/S and a consortium led by CVC Capital Partners Plc separately put in binding bids that value Deutsche Bahn AG’s logistics unit at about €14 billion ($15.6 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行称 7 月份消费者通胀预期走高
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）的数据显示，欧元区消费者的通胀预期有所上升，但这一上升不太可能足以阻止官员们推进降息。【原文：Inflation expectations of consumers in the euro area inched higher, according to the European Central Bank, though the increase is unlikely sufficient to stop officials from pushing ahead with interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 金田公司因智利和南非的挑战再次下调目标
item.description: 由于智利和南非矿山面临运营挑战，金田公司（Gold Fields Ltd.）在几个月内第二次下调了产量指导。【原文：Gold Fields Ltd. reduced its production guidance for the second time in a few months due to operational challenges at mines in Chile and South Africa.】

item.title: 政治风险缓解，泰国股市将迎来 2021 年以来最好的一周
item.description: 随着泰国政治不确定性的缓解和刺激经济的新建议重振投资者信心，越来越多的人相信，世界上表现最差的股票市场之一将迎来转机。【原文：Conviction is growing that one of the world’s worst-performing stock markets is due for a turnaround, as Thailand’s easing political uncertainty and new proposals to spur the economy revive investor confidence.】

item.title: 德意志银行终于摆脱了失败的邮政银行交易
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）在完成上一笔大型交易 16 年后，终于准备好继续前进。【原文：Sixteen years after its last major deal, Deutsche Bank AG is finally ready to move on.】
